structure.unit: RURAL ELECTRIC AND RURAL TELEPHONE COOPERATIVE CORPORATIONS

text.section:
The articles of incorporation of a corporation formed under KRS 279.310 to 279.600 shall be entitled "Articles of Incorporation of .... Corporation" and the title may include the word "Cooperative." The articles shall satisfy the requirements of KRS 14A.2-010 to 14A.2-150, recite that they are executed pursuant to KRS 279.310 to 279.600 and shall state:
The name of the corporation.
The address of its principal office.
The names and addresses of the incorporators.
The names and addresses of its trustees.
A general description of the territory in which it proposes to operate.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 84, effective January 1, 2011. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 136, sec. 1, effective June 16, 1973. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 3, effective March 25, 1950.
